sense.def: Pathological Condition Abbreviated Designation of wen yi 瘟疫 , warmth-illness epidemic. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 33: 水調塗五心及 額上、鼻中、耳門，辟瘟甚驗 , “Mix with water and apply to the chest, thepalms and the soles, as well as to the forehead, in the nose and on the ears to ward off warmth-illness . Very effective”. Wen bing 瘟病 , warmth-illness disease [2]

Pathological Condition identical with wen yi 瘟疫 , warmth-illness epidemic. San yin ji yi bing zheng fang lun 三因極一病證方論 6: 以 此論之，則知瘟病、飧泄、咳嗽，不可拘也 , “Having seen this one knows: warmth-illness disease , outflow of undigested food, and cough cannot be restrained”.
